content: What if you were asked to name the single feature that makes people attractive? What feature would that be?
What if you could return to secondary school or university and enroll in one class again? Which course would you take?
What if you could return to your childhood and give one of your toys the gift of speech? What would you want to learn from it?
What if your great-grandparents were all here in the room with you? What would you ask them?
What if a new test could reveal which of your parents' personality traits is most present in you? What trait would that be?
What if you could ask a single question to one person and know without a doubt that they will tell the truth? Who would you ask, and what would your question be?
What if you could ask one of your deceased family members a single question? Who would it be, and what would you ask?
What if you could learn more about your parents by experiencing a traumatic event that they also faced? Which event would tell you the most about them?
